channel.title: NixScape Error...?
channel.description:
When I first try to run "Run&Compile.bat" before editing it, this shows up...
[img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/816/temp4uu.png[/img]
I keep getting this error when I try to open the "Run&Compile.bat" file...
[img]http://img106.imageshack.us/img106/6316/temp2sz.png[/img]
I've already downloaded the Java sun thing and created the path names and all that good stuff but why is it still doing this? This is the only part where I'm having trouble.
Also, when I try to log on with the MoparScape client, I get an error connecting to the server.
[img]http://img479.imageshack.us/img479/1829/temp4rn.png[/img]

item.title: NixScape Error...?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

for the first problem, you need the latest jdk, and to make sure you have the path of the bin file in your system variables under path

Read full topic

item.title: NixScape Error...?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

G|a|M|e|R:

After copying and pasting that into the Run&Compile file, it still says what I showed in the second picture. For some reason, I can log onto the Nixscape server though.

Try downloading java then do what AD LVL 7 said

Read full topic

item.title: NixScape Error...?
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

on the first i can answer,
on the second i can’t answer,

with Run&Compile.bat you must change the code to

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAME) Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin/java.exe” server
pause

and, if that aint working,
take a fisit to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,643.0.html

Read full topic
